com.xensource.xenapi

Class PoolUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xensource.xenapi.XenAPIObject
      • com.xensource.xenapi.PoolUpdate

  • public class PoolUpdate
extends XenAPIObject
    Pool-wide updates to the host software First published in XenServer 7.1.
